source.4b07cf5f:
plt.figure(figsize=(12,8))
sns.jointplot(x=data["Danceability"], y=data['Energy'],height=10,kind="kde")
plt.ylabel('Energy', fontsize=12)
plt.xlabel("Danceability", fontsize=12)
plt.title("Danceability Vs Energy", fontsize=15)
plt.show()
